title: K-Beauty Brand Siita Shares Plastic Decomposition Technology With The Beauty Industry | Beauty Packaging
text:
Siita aims to be a leader in sustainable packaging—and its technology accelerates plastic decomposition—from 500 years to 3 months. Cookies help us to provide you with an excellent service. By using our website, you declare yourself in agreement with our use of cookies. You can obtain detailed information about the use of cookies on our website by clicking on "More information”.
